author: Dan Taekema
title: How to build a hospital wing for a pandemic in just 14 days
description: Joseph Brant Hospital in Burlington announced Monday it plans to spend more than $2 million putting up the temporary 93-bed facility.
content:
It started as a parking lot.
Then came the swooping aluminum supports with durable, white material wrapped over them.
Almost overnight, the painted lines were covered up and the pavement outside Joseph Brant Hospital began its transformation into a pandemic… [+5589 chars]
